sections.In the books: In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, the Forest of Qohor is traversed by Drogo's ''khalasar'', taking a full month to pass through its eaves. The trees are huge, with barks as big as city gates and possessing leaves that give off a golden hue in the sunlight. Lemurs, spotted tigers and great elks are found within the forest.
sections.History:
===[[Season 1]]===
The ''khalasar'' of Khal [[Drogo]] passes through the Forest of Qohor on its way from [[Pentos]] to [[Vaes Dothrak]]. Based on comments by Ser [[Jorah Mormont]], it is possible that the immensely tall forest of reeds that [[Daenerys Targaryen]] orders the ''khalasar'' to halt in is part of the Forest of Qohor<ref>[[Lord Snow]]</ref>.
